Flow.description: GTMS-26978 - Incumbent Changes GTMS - 27713 - CheckConflicts, Rebate Docs GTMS-27488 - Pull Deal Health Score Data from CRMA to CPQ, Placed API at start GTMS- 28169 - Added Bill to Contact Screen GTMS-28087- B360 Submit for approval changes GTMS-28544 - Display C360 discounts in the Submit for Approval and Preview Approval flows GTMS-28974 - Remove Template from Reason for Approval field on Quote GTMS-28505 - Worked on CLI Automation changes, CLI error messages, Auto approval logic. GTMS-29769 - Enhance Incumbent Questions in 'Submit for Approval Flow' GTMS-28505 - CLI Toggle Automation changes GTMS-28087- B360 Submit for approval changes GTMS-29370 - Update logic for 'Reason for discount' questionnaire in CPQ quotes

formulas.name: DoesnotContainsLink
is_AE2_AE3_ENT_Profile
formulas.expression: AND( CONTAINS({!$Profile.Name},"Samsara Sales"), OR ( CONTAINS({!$Profile.Name},"AE2"), CONTAINS({!$Profile.Name},"AE3"), CONTAINS({!$Profile.Name}," ENT ") ) )

formulas.name: JonCornTeam
formulas.expression: AND( OR ( CONTAINS({!Get_Quote_Info.Owner_Role__c},'ENT AE NA US'), CONTAINS({!Get_Quote_Info.Owner_Role__c},'ENT AE NA MX'), CONTAINS({!Get_Quote_Info.Owner_Role__c},'ENT AE CD NA'), CONTAINS({!Get_Quote_Info.Owner_Role__c},'ENT AE SR NA'), CONTAINS({!Get_Quote_Info.Owner_Role__c},'ENT AE NA') ), OR({!Get_Quote_Info.Manager_2__c}='0051P000003I8sC',{!Get_Quote_Info.Manager_3__c}='0051P000003I8sC') )

Flow.label: Quote Approval

fields.name: Reason_for_Discount_CBG
fields.fieldText: Reason Type(s) for Discount (Please select up to 3 options only)
fields.helpText:
• Customer budget - Discount used to fit customer's project budget
  • Competitor pressure - Discount used to win against a competitor
  • Contract buyout / subsidy - Customer would not purchase without a subsidy or buyout of current contract 
  • Payment terms - Discount used to incentivize annual or upfront payment terms
  • Increase deal momentum - Discount used to re-engage customer or accelerate time to close
  • Increase deal size - Discount used to incentivize customer to purchase a bulk order or future upsell orders
  • Price matching - Discount used to match discount of sister / parent company using Samsara or known Samsara customer
  • Seasonality - Discount used to account for fluctuations in licenses needed based on seasonal trends
  • Non-ELD - Customer does not need ELD features
  • Other: [Insert reason]

fields.name: Header
fields.fieldText: The questions below are only required for deals requiring AVP or Deal Desk approval. Please enter N/A if not required.

fields.fieldText: Provide any historical pricing offers that are relevant to the current order

fields.name: Reason_for_Discount_Supporting_Details
fields.fieldText: Provide supporting details on the reason for the discount, including any competitor pricing intelligence.

fields.name: Reason_for_Discount_List_Concessions
fields.fieldText: Summarize the complete list of concessions in the deal, including the discount strategy, price differentiation between billing frequencies, and reasoning for any one-time rebates or non-standard terms.

fields.name: Reason_for_Discount_Proposal_Timeline
fields.fieldText: Provide the timeline for presenting the proposal and when we expect a decision from the customer

fields.name: Rebates_Conflict_Message
fields.fieldText: There is a conflict detected for Rebates. Please open the Quote and click on Recalculate button in the Deal Component Calculator section.

textTemplates.name: PaymentTypeMismatchWarningMessage
textTemplates.text: You are selecting a Payment Frequency that is not aligned with the Account's Payment Frequency. This may prevent Samsara's ability to consolidate the customer's invoices and the customer will need to manage multiple invoicing schedules from Samsara.

textTemplates.name: QuoteDetails
reasonfordiscountdefault
textTemplates.text:
a. Provide any historical pricing offers that are relevant to the current order.


b. Provide supporting details on the reason for the discount, including any competitor pricing intelligence. (required)


c. Summarize the complete list of concessions in the deal, including the discount strategy, price differentiation between billing frequencies, and reasoning for any one-time rebates or non-standard terms.


d. Provide the timeline for presenting the proposal and when we expect a decision from the customer. (required)

textTemplates.name: ReasonForDiscountDefaultValue
textTemplates.text:
Header: The questions below are only required for MM, Enterprise & Majors deals requiring AVP or Deal Desk approval. Please enter N/A if not required.
1. Provide any historical pricing offers that are relevant to the current order.(required)
2. Provide supporting details on the reason for the discount, including any competitor pricing intelligence. (required)
3. Summarize the complete list of concessions in the deal, including the discount strategy, price differentiation between billing frequencies, and reasoning for any one-time rebates or non-standard terms.(required)
4. Provide the timeline for presenting the proposal and when we expect a decision from the customer. (required)

textTemplates.name: WorkAroundDocumentLink
textTemplates.text: Please review the Known Workaround Document. If that doesn't solve the issue, please create a ticket with SalesOps.

textTemplates.name: ZenDeskLink
textTemplates.text:
A data error is occurring in the Quote Approval Flow. Please open a ticket with SalesOps and provide this message:Please ensure Sales Rep and Approver ID are populated.

Submit a request - Samsara
